tool_description: This is an API that allows you to transform text into audio in Italian.
name: TTS Giorgio Italian
title: TTS Giorgio Italian

api_list.name: Giorgio's Voice
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tts-giorgio-italian.p.rapidapi.com/TextToSpeech/Ciao come stai?"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tts-giorgio-italian.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tts-giorgio-italian.p.rapidapi.com/TextToSpeech/{text}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tts-giorgio-italian.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
